title: Hiding in the AI Traffic: Abusing MCP for LLM-Powered Agentic Red Teaming
summary: Generative AI is reshaping offensive cybersecurity by enabling autonomous red team agents that can plan, execute, and adapt during penetration tests. However, existing approaches face trade-offs between generality and specialization, and practical deployments reveal challenges such as hallucinations, context limitations, and ethical concerns.
